f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 196
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 197 This rule should usually be generated using

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 199
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 200 bazel run @org_dropbox_rules_node//node/tools/npm:gen_build_npm -- my-module@1.2.3 ~/src/myrepo/npm/my-module
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 201
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 202 Defines an external npm module. The module and its dependencies
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 203 are downloaded using `npm_installer`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 204
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 205 All of the module's dependencies are declared in the shrinkwrap but
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 206 aren't known by Bazel. This is to work around Bazel's restrictions on
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 207 circular dependencies.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 208
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 209 One restriction that this rule places on it's output is that all
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 210 the files output must either be in the module's directory or in
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 211 '.bin'. E.g. if the module is named `module-name`, then this list
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 212 of contents is legal:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 213
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 214 contents = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 215 'module-name/src/something.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 216 '.bin/some-binary',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 217 ]
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 218
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 219 But this list of contents is not:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 220
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 221 contents = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 222 'module-name/src/something.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 223 'another-modules/something-else.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 224 ]
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 225
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 226 This allows us to be reasonably sure that any two modules can be
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 227 used together (except when '.bin' has conflicts, which should be
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 228 rare).
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 229
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 230 Args:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 231 npm_req: The npm string used to download this module. Must be in the form `module-name@1.2.3`.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 232 Used to auto-generate this rule.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 233
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 234 no_import_main_test: Don't test that the npm library can be required as if it has a main file. Defaults to False.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 235
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 236 We test that all imports can be imported like: `require('module')`. For some imports that don't
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 237 have a `main` js file to execute, this import will fail. For example, `@types/` npm modules will
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 238 fail. Set this to True to disable that check.

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 472 to only execute something if the node script is the "main" script,

f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 481 up flattened in `{package-directory}/node_modules`, where
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 482 `package-directory` is the directory that the node_binary target
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 483 is it. This means that, across all of your transitive dependencies
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 484 tracked by Bazel, you can't depend on different versions of the same
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 485 node module. (This does not apply to transitive dependencies of
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 486 npm_library rules, which are not tracked by Bazel.)
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 487
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 488 The environmental variable `NODE_PATH` is set to
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 489 `{package-directory}/node_modules` so that all the files that end up
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 490 running can find all the included node modules.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 491
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 492 One side-effect of that is that node libraries have access to all the
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 493 transitive dependencies for the node binary that depends on them.
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 494
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 495 Examples:
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 496 ```python
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 497 node_binary(
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 498 name = 'mybin',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 499 srcs = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 500 'mybin.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 501 ],
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 502 expose_gc = True,
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 503 main = 'mybin.js',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 504 deps = [
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 505 '//npm/loose-envify',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 506 '//npm/minimist',
f70174b564c582757a940c8fd0aa02fcbfafbca7[Sun, 27 Oct 2019 09:38:04 -0700][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 507 '//npm/mkdirp',
